00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Dhcpd extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'dhcpd';
00041     public $User= '_dhcp';
00042     
00044     private $leasesFile= '/var/db/dhcpd.leases';
00045     
00046     public $ConfFile= '/etc/dhcpd.conf';
00047     
00048     public $LogFile= '/var/log/dhcpd.log';
00049                         
00050     function Dhcpd()
00051     {
00052         parent::Model();
00053         
00054         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00055             $this->Commands,
00056             array(
00057                 'GetIfs'    => array(
00058                     'argv'  => array(),
00059                     'desc'  => _('Get DHCP interfaces'),
00060                     ),
00061 
00062                 'GetOption' => array(
00063                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00064                     'desc'  => _('Get DHCP option'),
00065                     ),
00066 
00067                 'GetRange'  =>  array(
00068                     'argv'  => array(),
00069                     'desc'  => _('Get DHCP IP range'),
00070                     ),
00071 
00072                 'AddIf' =>  array(
00073                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00074                     'desc'  => _('Add DHCP interface'),
00075                     ),
00076 
00077                 'DelIf' =>  array(
00078                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00079                     'desc'  => _('Delete DHCP interface'),
00080                     ),
00081 
00082                 'GetArpTable'   =>  array(
00083                     'argv'  => array(),
00084                     'desc'  => _('Get arp table'),
00085                     ),
00086 
00087                 'GetLeases' =>  array(
00088                     'argv'  => array(),
00089                     'desc'  => _('Get dhcp leases'),
00090                     ),
00091 
00092                 'SetOptions'=>  array(
00093                     'argv'  => array(IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR),
00094                     'desc'  => _('Set configuration'),
00095                     ),
00096 
00097                 'SetDhcpdConf'  =>  array(
00098                     'argv'  => array(IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR, IPADR),
00099                     'desc'  => _('Set dhcpd conf'),
00100                     ),
00101                 )
00102             );
00103     }
00104     
00105     function Start()
00106     {
00107         if (($ifs= $this->GetIfs()) !== FALSE) {
00108             $ifs= explode("\n", $ifs);
00109             $ifs= implode(' ', $ifs);
00110             return $this->RunShellCommand("/usr/sbin/dhcpd $ifs");
00111         }
00112         return FALSE;
00113     }
00114     
00119     function GetIfs()
00120     {
00121         $ifs= $this->SearchFile($this->rcConfLocal, '/^\h*#*\h*dhcpd_flags\h*=\h*("[^#"]*"|)(\h*|\h*#.*)$/m', 1, '"');
00122         return implode ("\n", preg_split('/\h+/', $ifs));
00123     }
00124 
00131     function AddIf($if)
00132     {
00133         $this->DelIf($if);
00134         if (($ifs= $this->GetIfs()) !== FALSE) {
00135             $ifs= explode("\n", $ifs);
00136             $ifs= trim(implode(' ', $ifs)." $if");
00137             return $this->SetIfs($ifs);
00138         }
00139         return FALSE;
00140     }
00141 
00146     function DelIf($if)
00147     {
00148         if (($ifs= $this->GetIfs()) !== FALSE) {
00149             $ifs= explode("\n", $ifs);
00150 
00151             // Don't use: unset($ifs[array_search($if, $ifs)]), check strictly
00152             if (($key= array_search($if, $ifs)) !== FALSE) {
00153                 echo array_search($if, $ifs)."\n";
00154                 unset($ifs[$key]);
00155                 $ifs= implode(' ', $ifs);
00156                 return $this->SetIfs($ifs);
00157             }
00158         }
00159         return FALSE;
00160     }
00161 
00166     function SetIfs($ifs)
00167     {
00168         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->rcConfLocal, '/^(\h*#*\h*dhcpd_flags\h*=\h*)("[^#"]*"|)(\h*|\h*#.*)$/m', '${1}"'.$ifs.'"${3}');
00169     }
00170 
00178     function GetOption($option)
00179     {
00180         return $this->SearchFile($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*option\h*$option\h*([^#;]*)\h*\;\h*$/m");
00181     }
00182 
00187     function GetRange()
00188     {
00189         global $Re_Ip;
00190         
00191         $re= "/^\h*range\h*(($Re_Ip)\h*($Re_Ip))\h*\;\h*$/m";
00192         if (($output= $this->SearchFile($this->ConfFile, $re)) !== FALSE) {
00193             return preg_replace("/\s+/", "\n", $output);
00194         }
00195         return FALSE;
00196     }
00197 
00208     function SetOptions($dns, $router, $mask, $bc, $lr, $ur)
00209     {
00210         $retval=  $this->SetOption('domain-name-servers', $dns);
00211         $retval&= $this->SetOption('routers', $router);
00212         $retval&= $this->SetOption('subnet-mask', $mask);
00213         $retval&= $this->SetOption('broadcast-address', $bc);
00214         $retval&= $this->SetRange($lr, $ur);
00215         return $retval;
00216     }
00217 
00224     function SetOption($option, $value)
00225     {
00226         global $Re_Ip;
00227         
00228         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*option\h*$option\b\h*)($Re_Ip)(\h*\;\h*)$/m", '${1}'.$value.'${3}');
00229     }
00230 
00236     function SetRange($lower, $upper)
00237     {
00238         global $Re_Ip;
00239         
00240         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*range\h*)($Re_Ip)(\h+)($Re_Ip)(\h*\;\h*)$/m", '${1}'.$lower.'${3}'.$upper.'${5}');
00241     }
00242 
00243     function SetDhcpdConf($lanip, $lanmask, $lannet, $lanbc, $lanmin, $lanmax)
00244     {
00245         global $Re_Ip;
00246     
00247         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*subnet\h+)($Re_Ip)(\h+netmask\h+$Re_Ip\h*\{.*)/m", '${1}'.$lannet.'${3}');
00248         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*subnet\h+$Re_Ip\h+netmask\h+)($Re_Ip)(\h*\{.*)/m", '${1}'.$lanmask.'${3}');
00249         $retval&= $this->SetOptions($lanip, $lanip, $lanmask, $lanbc, $lanmin, $lanmax);
00250         return $retval;
00251     }
00252 
00255     function GetArpTable()
00256     {
00257         $lines= $this->RunShellCommand('/usr/sbin/arp -an');
00258 
00259         // ? (10.0.0.2) at 00:d0:da:51:d3:c0 on em1
00260         $re_arp= "/^\? \((.*)\) at (.*) on (.*)$/m";
00261 
00262         $logs= array();
00263         if (preg_match_all($re_arp, $lines, $match, PREG_SET_ORDER)) {
00264             foreach ($match as $fields) {
00265                 $cols['IP']= $fields[1];
00266                 $cols['MAC']= $fields[2];
00267                 $cols['Interface']= $fields[3];
00268                 $logs[]= $cols;
00269             }
00270         }
00271         return serialize($logs);
00272     }
00273 
00274     function GetLeases()
00275     {
00276         global $Re_Ip;
00277 
00278         // lease 192.168.1.1 {
00279         //         starts 2 2009/09/08 17:52:36;
00280         //         ends 3 2009/09/09 05:52:36;
00281         //         hardware ethernet 00:1f:e2:61:96:9a;
00282         //         client-hostname "phenom";
00283         // }
00284         // lease 192.168.1.2 {
00285         //         starts 4 2009/09/10 21:26:28;
00286         //         ends 5 2009/09/11 09:26:28;
00287         //         hardware ethernet 00:00:f0:76:85:9e;
00288         //         uid 01:00:00:f0:76:85:9e;
00289         //         client-hostname "laptop";
00290         
00291         $re_starts= '\s*starts\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+\/\d+\/\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s*';
00292         $re_ends= '\s*ends\s+(\d+)\s+(\d+\/\d+\/\d+)\s+(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s*';
00293         $re_mac= '\s*hardware\s+\w+\s+(\w+:\w+:\w+:\w+:\w+:\w+)\s*';
00294         $re_uid= '\s*uid\s+(.+)\s*';
00295         $re_host= '\s*(client-hostname|hostname)\s+"(.+)"\s*';
00296         $re_abandoned= '(\s*(abandoned);\s*|)';
00297         
00298         $re_lease= "/\s*lease\s+($Re_Ip)\s*\{$re_starts;$re_ends;$re_mac;($re_uid;|)$re_host;$re_abandoned\s*\}\s*/m";
00299 
00300         $lines= $this->GetFile($this->leasesFile);
00301         
00302         $logs= array();
00303         if (preg_match_all($re_lease, $lines, $match, PREG_SET_ORDER)) {
00304             foreach ($match as $fields) {
00305                 $cols['IP']= $fields[1];
00306                 $cols['Starts (GMT)']= "$fields[3] $fields[4]";
00307                 $cols['Ends (GMT)']= "$fields[6] $fields[7]";
00308                 $cols['MAC']= $fields[8];
00309                 $cols['Host']= "$fields[12]";
00310                 $cols['Status']= $fields[14];
00311                 $logs[]= $cols;
00312             }
00313         }
00314         return serialize($logs);
00315     }
00316 }
